scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this letter to Daniel Webster, George Watterston asks Webster to view his own character sketch in Gallery of American Portraits(1830) which Watterston is sending; as a token of the author's respect. Suggests distributing copies among Webster's friends. With address leaf, docketed by [Webster ?].
